snippet: An inspector general’s report cites tension between liberal and conservative factions in the Bush and Obama administrations.
abstract: Justice Department's independent inspector general releases report finding that agency's voting rights section is plagued by infighting between liberal and conservative factions.
lead_paragraph: An inspector general’s report cites tension between liberal and conservative factions in the Bush and Obama administrations.

headline.seo: Report Finds Political Tension in Voting Agency
headline.main: Report Finds Political Splits and Unprofessionalism in Voting Agency
